address: MedCare Hospital, Cardiology Wing, Room 101, Mumbai
aboutDoctor: MBBS, MD (Cardiology), DM (Cardiology) from AIIMS. Fellowship in Interventional Cardiology from Cleveland Clinic. Specializes in complex coronary interventions and structural heart diseases. Published over 50 research papers in international journals.

degree: MBBS, MS (Ortho), Fellowship in Joint Replacement
address: MedCare Hospital, ENT Wing, Room 129, Kolkata
aboutDoctor: Dr. Pranathi Reddy is a highly skilled Joint Replacement Surgeon with over 12 years of experience in the field of Orthopedics. She specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of joint disorders, including hip, knee, and shoulder replacements. With a focus on providing patients with the best care through advanced surgical techniques and personalized rehabilitation plans, Dr. Reddy is committed to improving the quality of life for those suffering from joint pain and mobility issues
